--- category: release-notes version: 2.3.0 title: Pagination and Refactored Messaging breaking-changes: - Refactored messaging component to use inline SVG icons. potential-breaking-changes: deprecated: - Messaging component. For old messaging styles, include messaging.deprecated.scss added: - Warning message is now a component. - Pagination is now a component. release-notes: - Slightly decreased size of Card component shadow. - Card component now uses our $border-lighter variable. ---
